languages.text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} архмилитанта, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Универсальность{/g}, позволяет ему получать уровни эффекта этой способности при каждой атаке, тип которой отличается от типа предыдущей атаки архмилитанта. Типами атак в данном контексте являются: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g}, рукопашная атака (одиночная или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}), рукопашная атака по области, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционная{/g} атака по области, выстрел очередью. За каждый уровень эффекта "универсальность" архмилитант получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}. Если архмилитант накапливает 4 или больше уровней эффекта, то его атаки начинают наносить +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Ближнего Боя)% или +(3 × бонус Дальнего Боя)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} архмилитанта позволяет ему проводить на 1 атаку больше каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} до конца боя, включая ход применения героического акта. Первая атака после использования героического акта, а впоследствии и первая атака в каждый ход стоит 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} архмилитанта: Ближний Бой, Дальний Бой, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} архмилитанта: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}.

The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.
languages.original_text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} архмилитанта, Универсальность, позволяет ему получать уровни эффекта этой способности при каждой атаке, тип которой отличается от типа предыдущей атаки архмилитанта. Типами атак в данном контексте являются: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный выстрел{/g}, одиночный рукопашный удар, рукопашная атака по области, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционная{/g} атака по области, выстрел {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}. За каждый уровень эффекта "универсальность" архмилитант получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}. Если архмилитант накапливает 4 или больше уровней эффекта, то его атаки начинают наносить +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Ближнего Боя)% или +(3 × бонус Дальнего Боя)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} архмилитанта позволяет ему проводить на 1 атаку больше каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} до конца боя, включая ход применения героического акта. Первая атака после использования героического акта, а впоследствии и первая атака в каждый ход стоит 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} архмилитанта: Ближний Бой, Дальний Бой, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} архмилитанта: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran's passive keystone ability Right Tool for the Job grants them a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Veteran used. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack. For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5. If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to their Weapon Skill bonus / 2 or their Ballistic Skill / 2 (whichever is greater). The Veteran's heroic act lets them make 1 more attack per turn until the end of combat, including the turn when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Veteran makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 AP. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Strength, Toughness. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Carouse, Athletics, Demolition.

The Veteran's passive keystone ability Right Tool for the Job grants them a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the previous one the Veteran used. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack. For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5. If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to their Weapon Skill bonus / 2 or their Ballistic Skill / 2 (whichever is greater). The Veteran's heroic act lets them make 1 more attack per turn until the end of combat, including the turn when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Veteran makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 AP. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Strength, Toughness. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Carouse, Athletics, Demolition.

The Veteran's passive keystone ability, Right Tool for the Job, grants them a stack of right tool for the job each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Veteran. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst attack. For each stack of this effect on the Veteran, their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by +5. If the Veteran accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing additional damage equal to (WS bonus / 2) or (BS bonus / 2) (whichever is greater). The Veteran's heroic act lets them make 1 more attack per turn until the end of combat, including the turn when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Veteran makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 AP. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Agility, Strength, Toughness. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Carouse, Athletics, Demolition.

The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Versatility, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Versatility, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

languages.text: Die passive Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Erzmilitanten, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Vielseitigkeit{/g}, gewährt ihm einen Stapel "Vielseitigkeit", wenn er einen von seinem vorherigen Angriffstyp abweichenden Angriff ausführt. Für diese Fähigkeit gibt es folgende Angriffstypen: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} und Fernkampf-Salvenangriff. Für jeden Stapel dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g}, mit dem der Erzmilitant belegt ist, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} um +5. Hat der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel dieses Effektes, verursachen seine Angriffe zusätzlich +(3 × Waffenfähigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) % oder +(3 × Ballistik-Fähigkeit-Bonus) % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (es gilt der höhere Wert). Der Erzmilitant hat mit seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} bis um Ende des Kampfes 1 weiteren {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Zug{/g}, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}, in dem die Heldentat eingesetzt wird. Der erste Angriff nach der Heldentat und der erste Angriff des Erzmilitanten in jeder Folgerunde kostet 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Waffenfähigkeit, Ballistik-Fähigkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}.

For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die passive Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Erzmilitanten, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Vielseitigkeit{/g}, gewährt ihm einen Stapel "Vielseitigkeit", wenn er einen von seinem vorherigen Angriffstyp abweichenden Angriff ausführt. Für diese Fähigkeit gibt es folgende Angriffstypen: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff und Fernkampf-Salvenangriff. Für jeden Stapel dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g}, mit dem der Erzmilitant belegt ist, erhöht sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} um +5. Hat der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel dieses Effektes, verursachen seine Angriffe zusätzlich +(3 × Waffenfähigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) % oder +(3 × Ballistik-Fähigkeit-Bonus) % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (es gilt der höhere Wert). Der Erzmilitant hat mit seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} bis um Ende des Kampfes 1 weiteren {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Zug {/g}, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g}, in dem die Heldentat eingesetzt wird. Der erste Angriff nach der Heldentat und der erste Angriff des Erzmilitanten in jeder Folgerunde kostet 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Waffenfähigkeit, Ballistik-Fähigkeit, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Polyvalence{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé de l'archimilitant, lui octroie un cumul de Polyvalence chaque fois qu'il porte une attaque dont le type est différent de la précédente attaque infligée. Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque en rafale à distance. Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} obtenu par l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} augmentent de +5. Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Capacité de combat) % ou +(3 × bonus de Capacité de tir) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires (selon la valeur la plus élevée). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'archimilitant lui permet de lancer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque supplémentaire par tour{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat, y compris lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} durant lequel l'acte héroïque est utilisé. La première attaque portée après utilisation de l'acte héroïque et la première attaque de l'archimilitant à chaque tour suivant coûtent 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Capacité de combat, Capacité de tir, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Polyvalence{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé de l'archimilitant, lui octroie un cumul de Polyvalence chaque fois qu'il porte une attaque dont le type est différent de la précédente attaque infligée. Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque en rafale à distance. Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} obtenu par l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} augmentent de +5. Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Capacité de combat) % ou +(3 × bonus de Capacité de tir) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires (selon la valeur la plus élevée). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'archimilitant lui permet de lancer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque supplémentaire par tour{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat, y compris lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} durant lequel l'acte héroïque est utilisé. La première attaque portée après utilisation de l'acte héroïque et la première attaque de l'archimilitant à chaque tour suivant coûtent 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Capacité de combat, Capacité de tir, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}.

Polyvalence, la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé de l'archimilitant, lui octroie un cumul de Polyvalence chaque fois qu'il porte une attaque dont le type est différent de la précédente attaque infligée. Pour les besoins de cette capacité, les types d'attaques sont les suivants : {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}attaque à distance ponctuelle{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} ponctuelle, attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}. Pour chaque cumul de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} obtenu par l'archimilitant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} augmentent de +5. Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de cet effet, ses attaques infligent +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Compétence d'arme) % ou +(3 × bonus de Compétence balistique) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires (selon la valeur la plus élevée). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'archimilitant lui permet de lancer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque supplémentaire par tour{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat, y compris lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} durant lequel l'acte héroïque est utilisé . La première attaque portée après utilisation de l'acte héroïque et la première attaque de l'archimilitant à chaque tour suivant coûtent 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Compétence d'arme, Compétence balistique, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Ripaille{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}.

languages.text: 首席战士的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}多才多艺{/g}，可以让首席战士每次使用不同类型的攻击时，都会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。 不同的攻击类型包括：包括{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战{/g}攻击（包括单次攻击与连续攻击）、范围近战攻击、范围{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击。 首席战士每叠加1层“多才多艺”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点。 当首席战士至少拥有4层“多才多艺”层数时，首席战士的所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会获得百分比加成，等同于（3×武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%或（3×弹道技能加值）%，两者以较高者为准。 首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以让他们在每{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内额外发动1次攻击，包括使用英雄壮举的回合，效果持续至战斗结束。使用英雄壮举之后的首次攻击，以及首席战士在接下来每个回合的首次攻击，都不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：武器技能，弹道技能，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 首席战士的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：多才多艺，可以让首席战士每次使用不同类型的攻击时，都会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。 不同的攻击类型包括：包括{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战{/g}攻击（包括单次攻击与连续攻击）、范围近战攻击、范围{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击。 首席战士每叠加1层“多才多艺”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}层数，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高5点。 当首席战士至少拥有4层“多才多艺”层数时，首席战士的所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会获得百分比加成，等同于（3×武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%或（3×弹道技能加值）%，两者以较高者为准。 首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以让他们在每{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内额外发动1次攻击，包括使用英雄壮举的回合，效果持续至战斗结束。使用英雄壮举之后的首次攻击，以及首席战士在接下来每个回合的首次攻击，都不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：武器技能，弹道技能，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los Archimilitantes, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatilidad{/g}, les permite conseguir una acumulación de Versatilidad cada vez que realicen un ataque cuyo tipo sea diferente al anterior. A efectos de esta capacidad, los tipos de ataques son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (a un objetivo o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}) ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} en área y ataque de ráfaga a distancia. Por cada acumulación que obtenga el Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} aumentan en +5. Si el Archimilitante obtiene 4 o más acumulaciones de este efecto, sus ataques empiezan a infligir un +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por Habilidad de armas) % o un +(3 × bonificación por Habilidad de proyectiles) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional (usando el valor más elevado). El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los Archimilitantes les permite {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}atacar 1 vez más por turno{/g} hasta que termine el combate, incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en el que use el propio acto heroico. El primer ataque después de que use el acto heroico y el primero que realice el Archimilitante en cuestión en cada uno de los turnos siguientes consume 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Habilidad de armas, Habilidad de proyectiles, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los Archimilitantes, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatilidad{/g}, les permite conseguir una acumulación de Versatilidad cada vez que realicen un ataque cuyo tipo sea diferente al anterior. A efectos de esta capacidad, los tipos de ataques son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataque de un solo disparo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (a un objetivo o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}) ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} en área y ataque de ráfaga a distancia. Por cada acumulación que obtenga el Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} aumentan en +5. Si el Archimilitante obtiene 4 o más acumulaciones de este efecto, sus ataques empiezan a infligir un +(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por Habilidad de armas) % o un +(3 × bonificación por Habilidad de proyectiles) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional (usando el valor más elevado). El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los Archimilitantes les permite {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}atacar 1 vez más por turno{/g} hasta que termine el combate, incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en el que use el propio acto heroico. El primer ataque después de que use el acto heroico y el primero que realice el Archimilitante en cuestión en cada uno de los turnos siguientes consume 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Habilidad de armas, Habilidad de proyectiles, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}.

languages.original_text: The veteran's key passive ability, Correct Tool, allows him to gain points of this ability each time he makes an attack of a different type than the veteran's previous attack. The types of attacks in this context are: single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area ranged attack, and burst shot. For each point of the correct tool, the veteran gains +5 to Close Combat and Ranged Combat. If the veteran accumulates 4 or more points, his attacks begin to deal additional damage in an amount equal to the veteran's highest BB/2 bonus or DB/2 bonus. A veteran's Heroic Act allows him to make 1 more attack each turn until the end of the battle, including the turn he uses the Heroic Act. The first attack after using a Heroic Act, and the first attack each turn thereafter, costs 0 OD. Important Veteran Traits: Close Combat, Ranged Combat, Dexterity, Strength, Stamina. VeteranSkills: Observation, Medicine, Resilience, Athleticism, Explosive Engineering.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントの重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}である{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}汎用性{/g}では、アーク・ミリタントがその前に使用した攻撃タイプの異なる攻撃を行うたびに汎用性のスタックを獲得できる。 このアビリティに関する攻撃タイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}（単体または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}）、範囲近接攻撃、範囲{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃、遠距離バースト攻撃である。 この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の各スタックごとに、アーク・ミリタントは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+5増加する。 アーク・ミリタントがこの効果のスタックを4以上貯めている場合、アーク・ミリタントの攻撃は +（3×近接攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）％または+（3×射撃技能ボーナス）％（いずれか値の高い方）の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンにつき追加攻撃{/g}を1回可能にする。これには英雄的行為が行使された{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を含む。英雄的行為の後の最初の攻撃およびその後の各ターンのアーク・ミリタントの最初の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}：近接攻撃、射撃技能、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アーク・ミリタントの重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}である汎用性では、アーク・ミリタントがその前に使用した攻撃タイプの異なる攻撃を行うたびに汎用性のスタックを獲得できる。 このアビリティに関する攻撃タイプは、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}（単体または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}）、範囲近接攻撃、範囲{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃、遠距離バースト攻撃である。 この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の各スタックごとに、アーク・ミリタントは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+5増加する。 アーク・ミリタントがこの効果のスタックを4以上貯めている場合、アーク・ミリタントの攻撃は +（3×近接攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）％または+（3×射撃技能ボーナス）％（いずれか値の高い方）の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}1ターンにつき追加攻撃{/g}を1回可能にする。これには英雄的行為が行使された{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を含む。英雄的行為の後の最初の攻撃およびその後の各ターンのアーク・ミリタントの最初の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}：近接攻撃、射撃技能、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}。

languages.text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. If the Arch-Militant accumulates 4 or more stacks of this effect, their attacks start dealing an additional +(3 × Weapon Skill {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% or +(3 × Ballistic Skill bonus)% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (whichever is greater). The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Arch-Militant's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}, grants them a stack of versatility each time they make an attack whose type is different from the one previously used by the Arch-Militant. For the purposes of this ability, attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee attack, area {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, and ranged burst attack. For each stack of this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on the Arch-Militant, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} are increased by +5. The Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} lets them make 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat, including the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} when the heroic act is used. The first attack after the heroic act is used and the first attack the Arch-Militant makes on each of their subsequent turns costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

languages.text: Başmilitan'ın pasif kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Çok Yönlülük{/g}, Başmilitan ne zaman öncekinden farklı bir saldırı türü kullansa ona bir çok yönlülük birikimi kazandırır. Bu kabiliyet bağlamında saldırı türleri şunlardır: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Tek atış{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} (tek hedefli veya {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g}), alan etkili yakın dövüş saldırısı, alan etkili {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} saldırı ve seri menzilli saldırı. Üzerindeki bu {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkinin{/g} her bir birikimiyle Başmilitan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} nitelikleri 5'er puan artar. Başmilitan 4 veya daha fazla çok yönlülük birikimi elde ederse saldırıları +%(3 × Silah Yeteneği {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}) veya +%(3 × Balistik Yetenek bonusu) kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vermeye başlar. Yüksek olan değer kullanılır. Başmilitan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, 1 fazla {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} yapabilmesini sağlar. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kahramanca eylemin kullanıldığı {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} da buna dâhildir. Kahramanca eylem kullanıldıktan sonraki ilk saldırı ile Başmilitan'ın ardından gelen her yeni turunda yaptığı ilk saldırı, 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: Silah Yeteneği, Balistik Yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Tahribat{/g}.
